#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pi;
 
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MOD 1000000007

void mul(ll a[4][4], ll b[4][4])
{
	ll res[4][4];
	memset(res, 0, sizeof res);
	ll i, j, k;
	for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
		for(j = 0; j < 4; j++)
			for(k = 0; k < 4; k++)
				res[i][j] = (res[i][j] + a[i][k] * b[k][j]) % MOD;
	for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
		for(j = 0; j < 4; j++)
			a[i][j] = res[i][j];
}

void mul1(ll a[4][4], ll b[4][1])
{
	ll res[4][1];
	memset(res, 0, sizeof res);
	ll i, j, k;
	for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
		for(j = 0; j < 1; j++)
			for(k = 0; k < 4; k++)
				res[i][j] = (res[i][j] + a[i][k] * b[k][j]) % MOD;
	for(i = 0; i < 4; i++)
		for(j = 0; j < 1; j++)
			b[i][j] = res[i][j];
}

ll ans(ll n)
{
	ll m[4][4] = { {4, 1, 3, 2}, {0, 1, 0, 0}, {0, 0, 3, 2}, {0, 0, 1, 0} };
	ll a[4][1] = { {7}, {2}, {1}, {1} };
	while(n)
	{
		if(n & 1)
			mul1(m, a);
		mul(m, m);
		n >>= 1;
	}
	return a[0][0];
}

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	ll n;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		if(n == 1)
			cout << "7" << endl;
		else
			cout << ans(n - 1) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
